title: Representative Mac Thornberry of Texas
itunes:title: Representative Mac Thornberry of Texas
description:
Kevin spoke with Jack Fitzpatrick, Bloomberg Government Congressional reporter, and Saagar Enjeti, Chief Washington Correspondent & Host Hill TV. They discussed immigration, the census, and 2020 elections.

Kevin also spoke with Rep. Mac Thornberry about Iran.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
